definition.name: ToggleGroup
definition.purpose: Group multiple toggle buttons together with shared styling and context
definition.description: A flexible and accessible group component for toggle buttons, supporting variant and size context propagation. It wraps Radix UI's ToggleGroupPrimitive.Root and provides context for child toggle items.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the group

variant.description: Visual style variant for the toggle group and its items

size.description: Size of the toggle group and its items

children.description: ToggleGroupItem components or other React nodes

visible: A horizontal group of toggle buttons
enabled: All toggle buttons are interactive unless disabled

when.description: A user clicks a toggle button in the group

from.state: Some toggles selected or none selected
visible: Toggle group with one or more toggles in selected state
Toggle group with updated selection state

effects: The selected state of the clicked toggle is updated

definition.visualLayout: A flex row of toggle buttons with rounded corners and optional outline or shadow, styled according to the chosen variant and size.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix UI ToggleGroupPrimitive.Root for accessibility and state management. Context is provided for variant and size to child items.

definition.name: ToggleGroupItem
definition.purpose: A toggle button that is a child of a ToggleGroup, inheriting styling and context
definition.description: A toggle button component to be used within a ToggleGroup. It consumes context for variant and size, and applies appropriate styles. Wraps Radix UI's ToggleGroupPrimitive.Item.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the item

variant.description: Visual style variant for the toggle item (overrides group context if provided)

size.description: Size of the toggle item (overrides group context if provided)

visible: A single toggle button styled according to group context or its own props

effects: The button's selected state is toggled

definition.visualLayout: A flex item styled as a button, with rounded corners and context-driven styles.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix UI ToggleGroupPrimitive.Item for accessibility and state. Consumes context from ToggleGroup for consistent styling.
